Articles.Content:
Well the thing was that i tried to make this image using blender but it was a complete failure where nothing worked like it was supposed to work, and fixing it would take longer than to redo the entire thing.

so i decided to reuse the image that failed to create a hand drawn picture instead and will in the process save me lots of time (cause copying something that you made your self cant be called cheating can it?).

almost finished with this pic now

Will update this thread as i make progress

Edited August 12, 2012 by dt890
UPDATES !

Looks good so far! You might want to use your artistic license to draw that left kerbals legs to blend better to his body, and give them both necks, since their heads look a little odd joining directly to their flight suit. Maybe some smoke and flames emitting from the two redundant boosters.

Apart from that, awesome!

I love the KSP Fan base, So many brilliant artists, and it always looks great

All we need is a Kallery at the space centrewhere we can see the latest art *ahem* squad ;D
I love the work you've done with the smoke, might wanna try to blur the sharp edges a bit as they make the smoke look really out of place.
